title: new ranked changes in 8.24 have screwed with my lp win/loss points!?
body: two days ago i was getting 18-20 a win , and 16-19 a loss on my flex, now since new patch, i played two games today, i got 8 lp a win the first game and 19 a loss the second game. like wtf is going on, in the space of two days i haven't  lost like 50 games in a row to get my lp ratio that damn bad? my wins and losses in flex arent terrible  only 8 games roughly setting apart a 50/50 win ratio. as i said two days ago i was consistently getting 18-20/16-19 a loss and now its drop significantly for wins and maintained for losses. anyone else having this newly created problem since ranked armour and div 5 removal has happened??

replies.body:
Happened to me as well. Basically what happened was adding another league below bronze made everyone MMR negative, basically meaning a gold 5 rank possessed the same MMR as a silver player. How that works is they removed division 5 from the boards meaning from bronze-gold there are 3 fewer divisions to climb. And since there are 4 divisions in iron that makes a displacement of 1 division. So essentially everyone's MMR got demoted by 1 division inadvertently.  However the good news is that since theres a lower division, the quality of players in each division has dropped. Meaning if you actually belong in a certain division you can climb there quicker. 

I was g5 and got promoted to g4 and my mmr was silver 2 at the time. I was losing 30lp a game and only getting 13lp per win. Today I went on a 9 game winstreak and now im back in g4.
Yeah i was getting 15LP a win and as much as 24LP a loss. It has started to even out though, with enough games)(+18/-21)
Same thing happened to me. op.gg says that my mmr is higher than average for my rank with 51% win ratio. Was getting 20+ lp per win and today I won 3 games in a row and they all gave 16 lp each. Wtf?
same, i did 5 games today and got 12/16 lp each
